checklist.description: Review documentation: [spec.md](https://github.com/sderickson/saflib/blob/main/notes/2025-09-17-add-secret-store/spec.md)
This workflow will add all the prerequisite workflows needed for the secrets service project.
First, we will add the monorepo/add-export workflow. This workflow should:
Change working directory to monorepo
Add add-export to the CLI tool.

subitems.description: Copy template files and rename placeholders.
Upsert **add-export.ts** from [template](https://github.com/sderickson/saflib/blob/main/workflows/workflows/templates/template-file.ts)
Upsert **add-export.test.ts** from [template](https://github.com/sderickson/saflib/blob/main/workflows/workflows/templates/template-file.test.ts)
Upsert **index.ts** from [template](https://github.com/sderickson/saflib/blob/main/workflows/workflows/templates/index.ts)
Add name, description, and cliArguments to the newly created workflows/add-export.ts.
Export **add-export** from **@saflib/monorepo**.
Find the file which gathers all workflows to include them in the saf-workflow CLI tool.
If needed, install `@saflib/monorepo` as a dependency of the package that contains that file you found.
Add `@saflib/monorepo`'s exported workflows to the CLI file's list of workflows.
Check that the new workflow appears in the saf-workflow CLI tool.
Review documentation: [README.md](https://github.com/sderickson/saflib/blob/main/workflows/docs/README.md)
Create template files for add-export workflow.
Run `npx tsc --noEmit`
Add documentation links to the workflow.
Add steps to workflows/add-export.ts.
Review the checklist and verify that the workflow was added correctly.

Upsert **index.ts** from [template](https://github.com/sderickson/saflib/blob/main/workflows/workflows/templates/index.ts)
Add name, description, and cliArguments to the newly created workflows/init.ts.
Export **init** from **@saflib/grpc-specs**.
Find the file which gathers all workflows to include them in the saf-workflow CLI tool.
If needed, install `@saflib/grpc-specs` as a dependency of the package that contains that file you found.
Add `@saflib/grpc-specs`'s exported workflows to the CLI file's list of workflows.
Check that the new workflow appears in the saf-workflow CLI tool.
Review documentation: [README.md](https://github.com/sderickson/saflib/blob/main/workflows/docs/README.md)
Create template files for init workflow.
Run `npx tsc --noEmit`
Add documentation links to the workflow.
Add steps to workflows/init.ts.
Review the checklist and verify that the workflow was added correctly.
